data.fullContent: Cinema, the art of filmmaking, has a history that dates back more than a century. The first films were made in 1894 by Thomas Edison in New Jersey. The first public exhibition of his films was in 1895 in New York City. Later that year, filmed presentations were shown in London and Paris. Between then and the 1920s, as more and more films were made, a variety of camera types emerged. A film camera is a machine that records pictures, sounds and motion on a strip of film. At first, the film was projected through the camera viewfinder to be recorded, but it was soon found easier to record on the film during shooting with a device called an optical printer. Eventually, computer technology advanced enough to allow for the editing and manipulation of film in separate stages. Film editing became much easier when non-linear editing systems were introduced in the 1990s.

q1.translation: 电影，电影制作的艺术，有一个多世纪的历史。1894年，托马斯·爱迪生在新泽西拍摄了第一部电影。
q1.front: Cinema, the art of filmmaking, has a history that dates back more than a century. The first films were made in 1894 by Thomas Edison in New Jersey.
q1.content: Cinema, the ____ of filmmaking, has a ____ that dates ____ more than a ____. The first films were ____ in 1894 by Thomas Edison in New Jersey.

q2.translation: 电影，电影制作的艺术，有一个多世纪的历史。1894年，托马斯·爱迪生在新泽西拍摄了第一部电影。1895年，他的电影在纽约首次公开展览。同年晚些时候，在伦敦和巴黎放映了录像演示。从那时到20世纪20年代，随着越来越多的电影被制作出来，各种类型的相机出现了。胶片照相机是一种在胶片上记录图像、声音和动作的机器。起初，胶片是通过相机取景器投影来记录的，但很快就发现，在拍摄过程中，用一种叫做光学打印机的设备更容易在胶片上记录。最终，计算机技术发展到可以在不同的阶段对电影进行编辑和处理。20世纪90年代，非线性编辑系统被引入后，电影编辑变得容易多了。
q2.front: Cinema, the art of filmmaking, has a history that dates back more than a century. The first films were made in 1894 by Thomas Edison in New Jersey.
q2.middle: The first public exhibition of his films was in 1895 in New York City.
q2.ending: Later that year, filmed presentations were shown in London and Paris. Between then and the 1920s, as more and more films were made, a variety of camera types emerged. A film camera is a machine that records pictures, sounds and motion on a strip of film. At first, the film was projected through the camera viewfinder to be recorded, but it was soon found easier to record on the film during shooting with a device called an optical printer. Eventually, computer technology advanced enough to allow for the editing and manipulation of film in separate stages. Film editing became much easier when non-linear editing systems were introduced in the 1990s.

options.sentence: The motion picture is one of the most effective media for entertainment.
The term cinematography is used when referring to the act of filming.
For around one hundred years, little changed about the world of cinema.
The first public exhibition of his films was in 1895 in New York City.

options.sentence: By 1940, almost every home in America had a set of movies playing at least once a week.
The cinematograph was invented in 1891, but it wasn't until 1925 that the film industry took off.
Film has been around for thousands of years but was still considered a new invention in the early 1900s.
Cinema has a long history that began with the first films made by Thomas Edison in 1894.
